name: Scrolling List
author: Arron Schaar
description: A scrolling list that handles virtually unlimited number of items with very little performance degradation.

events.scrollstart: Fires when list scrolls to the first element.
events.scrollend: Fires when list scrools to the last element.

setters.items: Sets the item to iterate over.
setters.render: The render function used to create each item.
setters.index: Sets the current index and causes it to scroll to that location.
